error_no_internet_subtitle: Please check your Wi-Fi or mobile data and try again.
error_timeout_subtitle: The server is taking too long to respond. Please try again.
error_server_subtitle: We could not reach the server. Please try again later.
error_server_error_subtitle: An unexpected error occurred on the server. Please try again.
error_location_subtitle: Please enable location services and grant permission to the app.
error_unknown_subtitle: Something unexpected happened. Please try again.
